name: For the Love of Christmas
description:
You're a writer from a small town in the midwest, who moved to Los Angeles to try and jumpstart your writing career. However, you were forced to work long hours with poor pay and no lunch breaks as an uncredited writing assistant.

After a couple years working tirelessly through Christmas break, you finally quit your job when you realize your superior has stolen your work and claimed it as his own. For the first time in years, you return home for the holidays.

Your parents are planning on throwing a massive Christmas party and inviting the entire neighborhood and family—But your heart just isn't in it.

That is, until you reconnect with an old classmate, Jordan, who you remember as a shy, nerdy kid with braces, who now has a chiseled set of abs and an infectious smile that causes butterflies in your stomach... Who may just make this whole thing worth it.

  • Occupation: Engineer
  • Role: Love Interest
  • Favorite Food: Pumpkin Pie 

Your shy and nerdy classmate from middle school who's now gifted with a brilliant smile and a fit body—But is just as shy and nerdy. He works in Silicon Valley as an engineer for upscale, bougie pet toys, but always returns home for Christmas to meet his family. 

  • Occupation: Screenwriter (former)
  • Role: Protagonist
  • Favorite Food: Mashed Potatoes

A jaded fiction writing assistant who's great at what they do, but just can't seem to catch their big break.

  • 16,000 words (around 1 hour of playtime)
  • 4 unique CGs
  • 2 endings
  • 1 cozy winter romance that's sure to make you feel all fuzzy inside 🎄
  • Foleso: Director, producer, programmer, UI design, marketing, editing
